data.title: History of the Rise and Influence of the Spirit of Rationalism in Europe, vol. 2
data.meta_description: Lecky discusses the decline in the belief of magic and miracles, the rise of religious persecution, the gradual secularisation of politics, and the rise of toleration and rationalism.
data.text:
William Edward Hartpole Lecky (author)

Lecky discusses the decline in the belief of magic and miracles, the rise of religious persecution, the gradual secularisation of politics, and the rise of toleration and rationalism.

EBook PDF

This text-based PDF or EBook was created from the HTML version of this book and is part of the Portable Library of Liberty.
